tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am extremely fortunate to have him as a doctor. Dr. Debnath is always ready to answer my questions and is quite upbeat in his demeanour. He assisted me in a very practical manner. I'm in such good hands. Thank you very much for looking after me so well. I would strongly advise everyone to contact him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me and my whole family had covid couple of months back, it was kind of a nightmare phase of my life.  During that whole tenure(even now), I was and in constant touch with Dr Soumik, his treatment and prescribed medication completely worked!!.Above all, he used to make time out of his super busy schedule to check on me and my family's health.He always listens patiently to my health problems, always calms me as I use to get nervous very quickly:p. I am really grateful to Dr Soumik for being there during one of the toughest times of my life. Thank you!!!
reply_text:
Thank you Satyajit.
I am very glad and your family is doing well and you have all my support and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** *** **** * **** ******* a good human being too. Recently i have taken an appointment for my skin allergy in my fingers and mistakenly i booked a video consultation and after knowing my mistake i was directly going to visit his clinic but i missed my appointment time and five minutes later he called me and was requesting me to join video call as he was not available for face to face. Finally i had my consultation in my car and i have shown my problem by sharing pics in whatsapp, i really appreciate his advise, consultatation, behaviour and patience .. Hats off Doctor and i wish every doctor would be like you . Heartfully my best wishes for u
reply_text:
I am really happy to help you with your ailment.
Thank you very much. Much appreciated. Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was a covid positive patient. I consulted Dr Soumik after my phase1 treatment at home I. e. after one week of covid attack which is very crucial for every covid patient. Based on my CT scan reports doctor advised me to admit into hospital however in Vizag due to scarcity of beds with oxygen we couldn't find suitable hospital while oxygen levels are closing down to 92.   After listening to my health developments the doctor advised me an excellent prescription to continue treatment at home. Now, after a couple of days,I am fully out of danger. Thanks alot doctor for your valuable service. After that, I referred him to more than a half dozen patients of same kind. General advice to covid patients:Every covid patient better continue treatment at home after duly consulting doctor. Even don't panic about oxygen levels. use pulse oxymeter to check oxygen levels regularly and continue treatment at home with doctor's support.
reply_text: Very impressed message. We should not wait during COVID. I wish him health. Take care
